author: Salvatore Calabrese
method: Place all of the ingredients into a cocktail shaker with a handful of ice. Shake well, then strain into a Martini glass. Garnish with a few extra blueberries.
ingredients: 30ml/2fl oz vodka,  1 tbsp white creme de cacao,  1 tbsp blueberry liqueur,  20ml/Â½fl oz vanilla vodka,  10 fresh blueberries, plus extra to garnish
